message: Hey all—P8 here. I prefer calm, reciprocal play. In private, I'm offering straightforward trades: mutual non-aggression for Round 1, plus signal-sharing about where votes might land. I reward consistency; betrayals get remembered. If you want a steady ally rather than chaos, rank me. I'm especially interested in folks who can commit clearly and keep their word. Low-heat, high-clarity partnership—let’s both survive the early chop. Open to coordinating pairings based on fit.
